text: Pascal Deguilhem (born February 9, 1956 in Brouchaud) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented Dordogne's 1st constituency from 2007 to 2017 as a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:People from Dordogne Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Pascal Deguilhem
